prompts: Create a playful Pokemon with a bell-like body and vibrant colors that reflects happiness.
I want a small, round Pokemon with unique features that can be found in urban environments.
Generate a cheerful creature that has a bright yellow color and pink accents.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that looks like it could be a musical instrument.
Imagine a cute, tiny Pokemon that loves to play and has a friendly demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of joy and is often found in forests.
Give me a Pokemon that has a bell shape and a bubbly personality, perfect for kids.

distinctive_features: Two pink appendages resembling musical bells
